He was also a contributing member of the band ‘Enation’. However, aside from his first show, Michael never became a part of any other acting projects as such. It was his first and last show of his. He later came to media attention when he married One Tree Hill star Bethany. She was one of the popular names on television and they got married after dating for a short period of time. She played the role of Haley James Scott in the series.

Michael Galeotti: personal life, relationship and divorce

The former Disney actor married Bethany Joy Lenz after dating for a very short period of time. They started dating in December 2005 and after a month they fell in love and decided to get married. The couple got married on December 31, 2005. Their wedding became one of the biggest coverage in 2005.

Caption: Michael Galeotti and his ex-wife Bethany

Source: liverampup.com

The couple was happily married for six long years, but they finally started having problems after the birth of their daughter. Bethany gave birth to their first child, a girl, on February 23, 2011. Along with the birth of their daughter, things began to take an ugly turn for this couple and they ended their six year long marriage in March 2012. Bethany spoke publicly about the divorce on her social media, saying that they would remain friends and raise their daughter with the love she deserves.

Michael went on with his life and many controversies, including alcohol abuse and jail time for DUI. All of which caused him a lot of trouble.

Michael Galeotti Estate and death

Michael Galeotti had a troubled personal life after his divorce from actress Bethany Lenz. Galeotti had been battling some of the health issues like high cholesterol and hypertension. Other than that, he had previously been admitted to the hospital for dealing with some stomach issues in early January. He became insignificant towards his doctor’s advice and his own health. On January 11, 2016, one of his friends found him dead in his apartment and went to check on him after Michael did not receive calls from him. He died a sad and lonely death.

He had a short life and an even shorter career. Therefore, there is no exact estimate of the net worth of this deceased artist.
